summary:
This improves upon a few of the vanilla shouts. Multiple options available, including a powerful Fus Ro Dah, a \'Stop Time\' shout, more interesting Fire/Frost shouts, and more to come. 
Each available separately.
descriptionHtml:
This file now has multiple options. Please read below and select which one sounds like what your after. The original file is Imbarodah, which I made for personal use and released because nobody seemed to have made anything similar available.

If you use it please endorse!

If you have any requests, drop a comment, six of the current seven files are requests.

------------------------
 ImprovedRodah
------------------------

This file improves Unrelenting shout by a few times. It allows you to knock people roughly 10 feet, in ideal conditions about a river width. This esp was made upon request for a more balanced, less over the top shout.

------------------------
  ImbaRodah
------------------------
So, this small esp makes the shout \'Unrelenting Shout\' massively powerful. I haven\'t changed any of the sounds, just sets the magnitude of the shout to about 10,000 times higher than it is by default. This may sound like alot, but it isn\'t the length of Skyrim. In ideal conditions (I.e. from a dive rock style point) it can probably launch the length of Whiterun. 

------------------------
 Control Time
------------------------
This makes the Slow Time shout a bit different. The first stage works normally, slowing time. The second stage Speeds time up for 10 seconds, in case waiting isn\'t an option. The third level 
brings time to a standstill completely. Made upon request!


------------------------
    ImbaYol
------------------------

This tweaks the Fire Breath shout to make it more interesting. You breathe a flash of fire at stage one, spit out a fireball at stage two, and normal (But improved) final shout. Made upon request, enjoy :D

------------------------
  ImprovedYol
------------------------
This mod only slightly tweaks the fire shout, improving the overall shout without changing the mechanics of the shout. Made upon request!


------------------------
     ImbaFo
------------------------
This overhauls the frost breath shout. The first word is a dragons frost breath, the second is a frost ball with impact, and the third is an improved version of the normal shout. Enjoy! Made upon request.

------------------------
   ImprovedFo
------------------------
Only slightly tweaks the frost breath shout, improving the effects without changing the mechanics. Made upon request ;)

----------------------
   Installation
----------------------
1. Download
2. Extract files to your Skyrim Data directory
3. You may have to activate the esp in launcher
4. Enjoy your improved Fus Ro Dah!
author: Ceipher
